title: logo or font?
content:
I realize the image isn't the best but does anyone have any idea if this is a drawn logo or a font. If the later what might it be?  
Thank you in advance,  
Nick.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131024020239im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SEENlogo_5368.jpg)
author: nickplant

comments.content:
Probably custom.

I make that kind of lettering all the time (just for fooling around).
